title: Friend list bug ? online offline bug ?
body: My friend said to me he is online in game but on my friend list he is shown to be offline. Is this a bug or am i the only one having this problem !?

replies.body:
Sometimes it happens. If it is red that means he is online, but away. Yellow means he is in a game or queue, and green means he is online looking at the home screen.

Don't worry about it. I have a friend who's status is glitched it always says "Creating Ultra Rapid Fire". The amount of randoms that join our lobby and ask how the heck he is making URF games is hilarious xD

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JREb9lsE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-17T10:50:18.046+0000)
>
> Sometimes it happens. If it is red that means he is online, but away. Yellow means he is in a game or queue, and green means he is online looking at the home screen.
> 
> Don't worry about it. I have a friend who's status is glitched it always says "Creating Ultra Rapid Fire". The amount of randoms that join our lobby and ask how the heck he is making URF games is hilarious xD

no you don't understand that's not what i meant. My friend says he is online but on my friend list he is not online and the indicator is grey
I completely understood what you meant. The same thing happens to me sometimes. It just happens. Although if it keeps on occurring you should probably file a support ticket.
